```{r}
#Load in libraries
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data Reading

```{r}
census_2010<-read_csv("https://www4.stat.ncsu.edu/~online/datasets/EDU01a.csv")
```

## Data Processing

## Question 1: Column Selection

```{r}
#Select columns with area name, STCOU, and any column
#that ends in D
census_2010<- census_2010|> select(Area_name, STCOU, ends_with("D"))|>mutate(area_name=Area_name)
```
